description: Triangular array generated by its row sums: T(n,0)=1 for n >= 0, T(n,1)=r(n-1), T(n,k)=T(n,k-1)+d*r(n-k), d=(-1)^(k+1), for k=2,3,...,n, n >= 2, r(h)=sum of the numbers in row h of T.
prog: (PARI) {T(n, k)= local(A); if(k<0|k>n, 0, if(k==0, 1, A=vector(n, i, (i>1)+1); for(i=2, n-1, A[i+1]=(i-1)*A[i]+2); sum(i=0, k-1, (-1)^i*A[n-i])))} /* _Michael Somos_, Nov 19 2006 */
author: _Clark Kimberling_
